src_original: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
tgt_original: 時守籠那在靜處思惟，心自念言：

src_original: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;  ahaṃ teṣām anyatamaḥ;  atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
tgt_original: 「我今勤行精進，如佛弟子中無有勝我者，我今何故不得無漏解脫？

src_original: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;  yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;  dānāni ca dadyāṃ;  puṇyāni ca kuryām iti
tgt_original: 我家中大有財寶，可自娛樂自恣作福。

src_original: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;  upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
tgt_original: 」諸比丘白佛言： 「是守籠那比丘勤行精進，是其血污地。 」佛言：

src_original: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
tgt_original: 」比丘受教，往守籠那所語言： 「世尊喚汝！

src_original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
tgt_original: 」守籠那聞佛喚，即往佛所禮佛足却坐一面。

src_original: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi?
